title: New Bike Day! Is This the Best Mountain Bike Under $2500?
content:
It’s new mountain bike day! There’s nothing like unboxing a brand new bike, especially when it checks all the boxes for under $2500. In this video, I unbox it, leave it at my favorite bike shop for a pro build, and go for a quick ride.
